title: Venom blockchain hits 1M testnet wallets in two months
description:
Venom Blockchain has reached one million wallets on its testnet within just two months of its launch, according to a July 25 statement shared with CryptoSlate. The blockchain network’s Foundation attributed the rapid adoption “to its innovative technology, rigorous regulatory compliance, and secure, user-friendly environment catering to a diverse user base.” Speaking on the milestone, […]

The post Venom blockchain hits 1M testnet wallets in two months appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Unbanked no more: Bahamas launches crypto remittance platform
description: Island Pay, a Bahamas-based fintech company, has stepped forward with an innovative solution to address the high costs and challenges associated with traditional remittances. However, the company recently unveiled its digital wallet, “CiNKO,” tailored for users in Latin America and the Caribbean. CiNKO will utilize Circle’s USDC stablecoin as its primary currency, offering an alternative ... Read more

title: Worldcoin (WLD) could face regulatory inquiries in UK
description: Following its recent launch, Worldcoin (WLD), a crypto project co-founded by OpenAI’s CEO Sam Altman, could be facing inquiries from the UK’s data regulator.  The Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO), a body that focuses on data protection in the United Kingdom,…
